Objects.Name: key small red
Objects.Description: A small red key has been left here.
Objects.ExtraDescription: It's small, it's red, it's a key.

Objects.Name: key brass
Objects.Description: An worn brass key lies idlely on the ground here.
Objects.ExtraDescription: The brass key seems worn through years of use.

Objects.Name: oreo
Objects.Description: A moldy, dust covered Oreo(tm) cookie has been discarded here.
Objects.ExtraDescription: Oreo is a registered trademark of Christie Brown & Co.  A division of NabiscoBrands Ltd.

Objects.Name: key small iron
Objects.Description: A small iron key hangs from a hook here.
Objects.ExtraDescription: It has a 'W3625' insribed on it.

Objects.Name: key small iron
Objects.Description: A small iron key lies on a desk here.
Objects.ExtraDescription: It has a 'W2716' insribed on it.

Objects.Name: steak salisbury tray
Objects.Description: A tray of Mary Rotte salisbury steak has been left here.
Objects.ExtraDescription: It's not steak!

Objects.Name: burger garden
Objects.Description: A Mary Rotte garden burger lies here, lonely.
Objects.ExtraDescription: You've never seen anything more disgusting in your life.

Objects.Name: eggs fried
Objects.Description: Some Mary Rotte fried eggs sit here slowly hardening.
Objects.ExtraDescription: You're not sure, but you think that they are plastic.

Objects.Name: dish lyonnaise potatoes
Objects.Description: A dish of Mary Rotte lyonnaise potatoes wobbles around here.
Objects.ExtraDescription: What is lyonnaise, anyways?

Objects.Name: calzone
Objects.Description: A Mary Rotte calzone cools here.
Objects.ExtraDescription: It's similar to a pizza pop.  It looks vaguely edible.

Objects.Name: barbells
Objects.Description: A HUGE set of barbells lies here, gathering dust.
Objects.ExtraDescription: They look heavy.

Objects.Name: condom
Objects.Description: A condom has been carefully placed here.
Objects.ExtraDescription: One of the old type...  The ones they give away for free.

Objects.Name: tam
Objects.Description: A tam is here...
Objects.ExtraDescription: This tam is real ugly.  I mean ugly.

Objects.Name: tray blue
Objects.Description: No it couldn't be... a blue tray!
Objects.ExtraDescription: You can't believe you actually found one.  Blue trays are almost as common astalking dogs that speak in Norwegian!

Objects.Name: hairnet
Objects.Description: A hairnet has been thrown away here.
Objects.ExtraDescription: This thing (blech) must be glowing from the radiation...

Objects.Name: flashlight light
Objects.Description: A long flashlight has been dropped here.
Objects.ExtraDescription: This looks like one of the flashlights Security uses...  Uh-oh...

Objects.Name: jacket yellow
Objects.Description: A nice yellow jacket has been carefully hung here.
Objects.ExtraDescription: This nice, yellow jacket has the word STU-CON emblazoned on the back.

Objects.Name: knife evil
Objects.Description: An evil knife lies on the ground here.
Objects.ExtraDescription: This is an evil knife, pure and simple.

Objects.Name: key silver
Objects.Description: A small silver key lies forgotten here.
Objects.ExtraDescription: This small key has only one marking on it, the number BF128.

Objects.Name: key brass
Objects.Description: A small brass key lies forgotten here.
Objects.ExtraDescription: This brass key is marked with the number HG34.

Objects.Name: blade darkness
Objects.Description: A dark, incredibly sharp blade lies on the ground here.
Objects.ExtraDescription: The blade has a dark aura surrounding it.  It seems to absorb any light thatdares to stray near it.

Objects.Name: cloak twilight
Objects.Description: A dark brown-to-black cloak has been left here.

Objects.Name: sword mage bane magebane
Objects.Description: An oddly shaped sword lies here.
Objects.ExtraDescription: It's shape is very peculiar.  It seems to have a glowing aura.

Objects.Name: orb obsidian
Objects.Description: An Obsidian orb is emoting darkness here.
Objects.ExtraDescription: This Orb looks distinctly evil.

Objects.Name: gpa golden party armor
Objects.Description: A beautiful Golden jacket has been left here.
Objects.ExtraDescription: The crest seems to portray the numbers 9 and 7.

Objects.Name: furry hat
Objects.Description: An extremely Furry Hat has been carefully hung on the wall here.
Objects.ExtraDescription: This hat is covered with fur and has rather nice ear-flaps.

Objects.Name: boots work
Objects.ShortDescription: an old pair of work boots
Objects.Description: A pair of boots has been left here.
Objects.ExtraDescription: This pair of boots is well worn.

Objects.Name: vest silver
Objects.Description: A nice, shiny, silver vest has been lost here.
Objects.ExtraDescription: It's shiny, it's silver ...  What more could you want?

Objects.Name: hairbrush silver hair brush object
Objects.Description: A silver object has been dropped here.
Objects.ExtraDescription: This nice, silver hairbrush is a bit tarnished but still suffices to untanglehair.

Objects.Name: extension cord
Objects.Description: A long extension cord stretches to the north and south.
Objects.ExtraDescription: The extension cord was probably made by the twin power-mages Black and Deckerand seems to stretch off to the horizon.

Objects.Name: extension cord
Objects.Description: A cord comes in from the street and is plugged in an outlet to the east.
Objects.ExtraDescription: The extension cord was probably made by the twin power-mages Black and Deckerand leads off into the street.  Wonder where it leads?

Objects.Name: extension cord
Objects.Description: An cord comes from the back of the Coke Machine and stretches to the north.
Objects.ExtraDescription: The extension cord was probably made by the twin power-mages Black and Deckerand seems to stretch off to the northern horizon.

Objects.Name: extension cord
Objects.Description: A long extension cord stretches to the south and into a building to the east.
Objects.ExtraDescription: The extension cord was probably made by the twin power-mages Black and Deckerand seems to stretch off to the southern horizon and into the building whichjust happens to lie to the east.

Objects.Name: world xeen
Objects.Description: The World of Xeen(tm) game is sitting here.
Objects.ExtraDescription: This game is a combination of Might & Magic IV and V (tm) and takes up a lotof hard drive space.  Almost 42 megabytes in fact!

Objects.Name: sword long longsword
Objects.Description: An ordinary long sword gathers dust here.
Objects.ExtraDescription: Looks almost like your generic long sword, but not quite.

Objects.Name: t-square t square death
Objects.Description: A T-square has been carelessly discarded here.
Objects.ExtraDescription: This T-square is an extremely sharp weapon, and has been well used.

Objects.Name: apple
Objects.Description: An extremely pale apple sits here.
Objects.ExtraDescription: It looks like it didn't get enough sun.

Objects.Name: milk bottle milk
Objects.Description: A bottle with a brightly colored label sits here.
Objects.ExtraDescription: This bottle has such greenish glass that you can't see if anything is inside.

Objects.Name: wine carafe wine
Objects.Description: A wooden carafe sits on a table here.
Objects.ExtraDescription: The wooden carafe seems to be some sort of container.

Objects.Name: firebreather glass shotglass firebreather
Objects.Description: A shotglass has been discarded here.
Objects.ExtraDescription: This small glass looks like it would be emptied in a drink or two.

Objects.Name: water popcoke coke pop can water
Objects.Description: A can of PopCoke awaits you here, cool and refreshing.
Objects.ExtraDescription: This can is elegantly decorated with garish colors that almost make yousick.  They were probably intended to have a similar effect to the drink inside.

Objects.Name: candy bar
Objects.Description: A candy bar is here!
Objects.ExtraDescription: This candy is made of the highest standard of chocolate.  It even meets thestandards of the Candy Man.

Objects.Name: key steel
Objects.Description: A large steel key lies hidden here.
Objects.ExtraDescription: This large, steel key is very ordinary.

Objects.Name: copy golden world
Objects.Description: A copy of Golden World lies here.
Objects.ExtraDescription: It looks like the student humor newspaper, but it contains nothing to dowith actual news that you didn't know already.

Objects.Name: water bottle water
Objects.Description: A large Water Bottle stands in the corner.
Objects.ExtraDescription: It seems to have water in it and it reminds you of one of the water bottlesused in hamster's cages.

Objects.Name: key vic
Objects.Description: A key elusively lies quite convincingly.
Objects.ExtraDescription: This key is an effective master of the art of uselessness...  You wonder whyit is even here.

Objects.Name: computer
Objects.Description: A computer sits quietly in the corner.
Objects.ExtraDescription: The computer is turned on and on the screen you can see:0) Exit from DikuMud.1) Enter the game.2) Enter description.3) Change password.5) Read History.   Make your choice:

Objects.Name: letter
Objects.Description: A letter lies here.
Objects.ExtraDescription: This looks like it was postdated a loooong time ago.  Wonder why it hasn'tbeen delivered.

Objects.Name: mail
Objects.Description: A piece of mail is here.
Objects.ExtraDescription: This piece of mail has been stamped and dropped into the mailbox and ispresently awaiting delivery.

Objects.Name: parcel
Objects.Description: A large parcel stands here.
Objects.ExtraDescription: This parcel has been wrapped with brown paper and sealed with Duct Tape.Looks like it's never getting opened again.

Objects.Name: milk dispenser milk
Objects.Description: A milk dispenser sits at the back of the auditorium.
Objects.ExtraDescription: Darn!  It seems to be broken.

Objects.Name: milk carton white milk
Objects.Description: A cool carton of refreshing milk catches your eye.
Objects.ExtraDescription: Hey!  It's got that cool picture from those commercials!

Objects.Name: milk chocolate carton milk
Objects.Description: A cool carton of refreshing milk catches your eye.
Objects.ExtraDescription: Hey!  It's got that cool picture from those commercials too!

Objects.Name: map
Objects.Description: A handy-dandy map of the campus is standing here.
Objects.ExtraDescription: To see the map, type "look part1" and "look part2".  There is also aninscription on the map.

Objects.Name: key ghostly
Objects.Description: You can see through an object resembling a key.
Objects.ExtraDescription: This key is extremely ghostly, and you fear to put it down as you might notbe able to find it again.

Objects.Name: nothing
Objects.Description: .A hidden nothing.

Objects.Name: pendulum
Objects.Description: A large pendulum swings here.
Objects.ExtraDescription: A small plaque on the base reads: This pendulum was donated by the Class of'67 Of course....  You do have a little trouble reading this as the pendulumswings inches from your head.

Objects.Name: water fountain water
Objects.Description: A drinking fountain is firmly attached to the wall here.
Objects.ExtraDescription: You can tell it is firmly attached simply by pulling on it.

Objects.Name: chest wooden
Objects.Description: There is a wooden chest here.
Objects.ExtraDescription: This is your average, every day, run-of-the-mill, wooden chest.

Objects.Name: ledger book
Objects.Description: A large book with the word "Ledger" written on it has been forgotten here.
Objects.ExtraDescription: This book is filled with numbers, dates, and strange notation.  It is enoughto put anyone to sleep.

Objects.Name: chest wooden
Objects.Description: There is a wooden chest here.
Objects.ExtraDescription: This is your average, every day, run-of-the-mill, wooden chest.

Objects.Name: bag coins gold
Objects.Description: A small bag filled with coins lies here.
Objects.ExtraDescription: This bag of coins doesn't look too big.
